name: NativeBase v3 Design Kit
description:
NativeBase Figma components library with modular and accessible components that give you the building blocks you need to design and build your React and React Native applications.


What's Included

  • Extensive styles for typography and color.
  • Dynamic layers powered by Auto Layout.
  • Highly themeable components.
  • Responsive designs for different platforms.
  • Available in light and dark mode.

All components are open source and available for production-level React and React Native applications.


Community

Follow us on Figma↗ and Twitter↗ for regular updates or say 'Hi.'


﻿Feedback

If you have any requests or bugs you'd like to report related to this UI Kit, please get in touch with us at Twitter↗ and Discord↗, and we'll try to address them as soon as possible.
